column1: On [[6 February]] [[1972]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to [[Vera Chapman]] and [[The Tolkien Society]]'''.

column1: *'''Contents:''' Tolkien thanks the letter receivers for their good wishes and birthday gift.<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (2006), ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Chronology'', p. 759</ref><ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'', at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>

column2:
Dear Mrs. Chapman,

May I thank you and the Tolkien Society for your good wishes and kind gift on my 80th birthday. I appreciated your generosity very much indeed.

Best wishes,

Yours sincerely,

J.R.R. Tolkien}}
